transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji hello.
Executive: Ji mam good afternoon.
Customer: Very good afternoon.
Executive: Aap free hai abhi?
Executive: Yes yes bataiye.
Customer: Thik hai main aapko na video meet ka link share kar rahi hu mail pe.
Executive: Thik hai kar dijiye. Okay.
Customer: Aapko karna hai SG
Customer: Mam maine na
Executive: Mail aapke paas kaunsa hai?
Customer: Main check kar rahi hu mere mail pe hai ya mail singh wale pe dala hai.
Customer: Abhi to mam mere pe to nahi aaya.
Customer: Main aapko apna mail id share kar rahi hu please.
Executive: Okay to jo mail id yaha dala hua hai usse nahi join kar rahe aap?
Customer: Hmm wo Rama ka dala hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: No no Rama pe nahi jayega. Ye jayega
Customer: Priyansh 091019
Executive: Mam wahi email id hai. Mam aapke na whatsapp pe maine message drop kiya tha aap check kiya. Email id abhi.
Customer: Haan aap mujhe na email id waha drop kariye please.
Executive: Okay main kar rahi hu. Ye number isi number pe whatsapp hai na 7758548
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Achha mujhe mail waha pe drop kariye thik hai.

Customer: Priyansh 091019 thik hai.
Customer: Mam ye mail ye join kar lijiye na.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Haan mam main aapka wait kar rahi hu na video meet pe.

Customer: Haan mam aawaz aati aayegi na phone mein?
Executive: Yes aayegi.
Customer: Okay main fir call disconnect karti hu thik hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs help joining video meet.

- Customer wants the executive to share email ID.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to share email ID on WhatsApp.

- Executive confirmed the WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, email id, whatsapp
